message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take a bit more since I lose more if we don't make a deal.
Your cut decreases faster than mine, Alice. Let's be a bit closer to equal this time.
I understand the time pressure, Bob, but I need a better deal than that. This offer is a compromise.
This is a fair deal, Alice.  We both know the longer this goes on the less we both get.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle.  This is my final offer.
